newsitem.title: USA: Hughes Missile nets $125 mln contract.
newsitem.headline: Hughes Missile nets $125 mln contract.

text.p: Hughes Electronics Corp unit Hughes Missile Systems Co said on Tuesday the U.S. Army has awarded it two tactical missile contracts worth over $125 million.

The contract covers the production of 1,299 Stinger-RMP (reprogrammable microprocessor) missiles, 334 launchers and support equipment and is primarily in support of the Taiwan Avenger-Stinger program.
Work on the contracts, scheduled to be completed in June, 2000, will be done mainly in Tucson, with manufacturing also performed in New Mexico, Alabama and California.
